org.iocaste.documents.common

Class DataElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.iocaste.documents.common.DataElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DummyElement

    public class DataElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Data element implementation.

    It stores the technical specs of a document model item.

    Author:
    Francisco Prates
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isDummy

        public final boolean isDummy()
        Dummy elements are references for real data elements. It holds no technical specs. It just points to the real element.
        Returns:
        true, if this is a dummy element.

      • isUpcase

        public final boolean isUpcase()
        Returns:
        true, if the value might be converted upcase.
